topic.title: Configure the Operating System
topic.shortdesc: You must create a definition for the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.0 operating system.

ol.li: Execute the hammer os create command to create a definition for the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.0 operating system.# hammer os create --name "RedHat" --major 7 --minor 0 --family Redhat

After creating the operating system, execute the hammer os list command.
Take note of the ID for the new RedHat 7.0 operating system.
Execute the hammer os add-architecture command to associate the x86_64 architecture with the RedHat 7.0 operating system.# hammer os add-architecture --architecture x86_64 --id OS_ID

The appropriate partition table needs to be associated with the operating system. Execute the hammer os add-ptable command to associate the partition table to the operating system ID.# hammer os add-ptable --ptable-id P_ID --id OS_ID
